details.tileBewitchedSapling: A sapling that produces sipa during the night.
details.tileCrystalizer: Crystalizes liquid Sipa into Sipa Crystals used in various crafting recipes.
details.tileDaybreakSapling: A sapling that produces sipa during dawn.
details.tileNightfallSapling: A sapling that produces sipa during dusk.
details.tileShadowlessSapling: A sapling that produces spia during the day.
details.tileSipaPump: A device to extract Sipa from a producing tree. Stores Sipa in a tank placed beneath.
details.tileSipaTank: A basin to store Sipa extracted by a Sipa Pump.
